comment: Was that for your st or nd? I was fine with my st dose, just a bit of shoulder pain for days, but I've heard the nd dose is worse. I'm getting Moderna, so I don't get my nd until the st.
amr:
# ::snt Was that for your st or nd? I was fine with my st dose, just a bit of shoulder pain for days, but I've heard the nd dose is worse. I'm getting Moderna, so I don't get my nd until the st.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / concern-02
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown)
            :ARG0 (t / that)
            :ARG1 (o / or
                  :op1 (s / st)
                  :op2 (m2 / medicine
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "ND"))
                  :poss (y / you)))
      :snt2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (f / fine-04
                  :ARG1 (d / dose-01
                        :ARG0 (ii / i)
                        :ARG2 (p / pain-01
                              :ARG1 (s2 / shoulder)
                              :quant (b / bit)
                              :mod (j / just)
                              :duration (m3 / multiple
                                    :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                          :quant 1
                                          :unit (d2 / day)))))
                  :ARG2 (h / hear-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (h2 / have-degree-91
                              :ARG1 (d3 / dose-01
                                    :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                                    :ARG2 (m4 / medicine))
                              :ARG2 (b2 / bad-07
                                    :ARG1 d3)
                              :ARG3 (m5 / more))))
            :snt3 (g / get-01
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG1 (m6 / medicine
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Moderna"))
                  :ARG0-of (c3 / cause-01
                        :ARG1 (g2 / get-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG0 ii3
                              :ARG1 m6
                              :time (u / until
                                    :op1 (g3 / get-01
                                          :ARG0 ii3
                                          :ARG1 m4)))))))

comment: Yay! Just FYI might be good to have someone drive you if youre able - my reaction wasnt bad but I was SO exhausted I slept for like hours straight.
